content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions, but England has a strong and well-rounded team, so they certainly have the potential to do well in the next World Cup as well. However, cricket is a game of uncertainties, and it's difficult to predict anything with certainty. Various factors, such as injury, form, and opposition, can impact a team's performance in a tournament. So, we will have to wait and see how things shape up for England in the next World Cup.
